thread.title: LAUREN MARTIN
thread.title_full: Hodges Badge Company, Inc reviewed by LAUREN MARTIN

author: LAUREN MARTIN
title: LAUREN MARTIN
text: I have ordered event ribbons from Hodges Badge Co. four times- three for work and once for a Scouting event. Every time their service has been excellent and the ribbons were exactly what I had pictured. I would not think of ordering from anyone else.
